column4: Incredible tasting pizza and suppliüòç the owner of this small bistro is a truly friendly guy! Greetings from Vienna üòò
The pizzas are just CRAZY delicious!! Worth the 5* Very welcoming and giving good advices! 100% recommend

Food was absolutely gorgeous. Such an amazing price for the amount of pizza given. You pay for the weigh of pizza!! Such a lovely owner very friendly! Made our lunch for 3 days in a row when we visited! Definitely a Rome must visit!!
Super nice owner and delicious Pizza. We definitely recommend this Place. We come back, when we‚Äòre next time in rome.
Great pizza. Great service we were given plenty of water on the house which helped beat the heat of Rome!
You can try lots of different flavors because pizzas are sold by weight, my favorite was the chef's favorite: ZUCCA !
Great variety, great combinations of toppings and flavours and value for money. All in all, the best pizza we had in Rome!
Delicious pizza, you pay by weight and it is inexpensive. I would highly recommend this place, there are benches nearby where you can eat it and look at the ruins!

column3: One of the best pizzas I ever
column4: One of the best pizzas I ever eat!! The one with pumpkin was amazing. Also really educated staff. üòÑüòÑ
The typical fast food, cut-to-squares, crunchy crust pizza, with many topping options. Very affordable and fair price, fast service. Taste is nothing special.

column3: Cheap pizza that taste really fantastic!
column4: Cheap pizzas that are really tasty and love the the crispy crust! Friendly service too which is a rare trait in Rome! Gets Super crowded during lunch time. Only gripe is that limited seats.
I can say this is the best pizza I've ever had. This place is always busy but staff is friendly, ESPECIALLY Dora. She is very helpful. Love this place. Kham
Looked up where to eat Roman Pizza beforehand and this place was top of my list! Incredible, ladies were nice and spoke enough English for tourists! Also incredibly cheap.

Ended up eating here,every time we walked passed it.we arent that type that likes to sit in a restaurant,for hours,so this was perfect.its basicly a pizza "to go" place.we stayed close by,so did take pizza home also.
Best pizza I have had in my life! The staff are all very warm and friendly and you can easily get a couple of slices and have that as your meal. Would definitely recommend. 10/10!

A small pizza place run by really kind staff, one of the older pizza ladies insisted we got pizza with the limited amount of cash we had with us because they weren't taking card payments (SO nice of her!!). The pizza is rectangular and the...More
The typical fast food, cut-to-squares, crunchy crust pizza, with many topping options. Very affordable and fair price, fast service. Taste is nothing special.

You could easily walk by this place and not think twice. We sought them out due to the consistent high reviews and we were not disappointed. When we arrived the nice people behind the counter were happy to take our order in our [broken] Italian or in English. I pointed to the pizza I wanted and she asked how much I wanted. I am used to ordering pizza in discrete quantities - like 'a slice' or a whole pizza. She recognized my confusion, grabber her scissors, and cut me off a chunk and put it in the oven. There happened to be space at the tiny indoor dining area so we ate inside. That was nice so we could watch the other- mostly local - patrons. I really enjoyed the pizza here and highly recommend it.

column3: Cheap pizza that taste really fantastic!
column4: Cheap pizzas that are really tasty and love the the crispy crust! Friendly service too which is a rare trait in Rome! Gets Super crowded during lunch time. Only gripe is that limited seats.

I was dragged here from the Forum by my subtle colleague who intimated that she would relish the opportunity to eat pizza. I purchased pizza. Pizza is readily available in Pizza Florida. The pizza was delicious and the staff were very friendly and were very patient with my friend who could not decide on her favourite pizza. She eventually picked the peperonni pizza, which she ate.
I can say this is the best pizza I've ever had. This place is always busy but staff is friendly, ESPECIALLY Dora. She is very helpful. Love this place. Kham
Looked up where to eat Roman Pizza beforehand and this place was top of my list! Incredible, ladies were nice and spoke enough English for tourists! Also incredibly cheap.

Ended up eating here,every time we walked passed it.we arent that type that likes to sit in a restaurant,for hours,so this was perfect.its basicly a pizza "to go" place.we stayed close by,so did take pizza home also.

column3: A tasty surprise - best pizza we had in Rome!
column4: We spent 6 nights in Rome and decided to try different pizza places. We were disappointed the first several times. I was online looking up pizza near our hotel (Monte Cenci) and saw Pizza Florida had great reviews and was only about a 5 minute walk away. And since we live in Florida, it was obviously meant to be. Actually, it is on Via Florida. The seating is very limited. Don‚Äôt go if you are looking for quiet and ambience. Be prepared for a line at certain times of the day. There are about a dozen pizzas ready for you to choose slices from for just a few dollars. I had never thought before about eating pizza covered in a pink cream sauce and shrimp - but it was delicious! We sampled several others as well but the shrimp remained our favorite. Definitely recommend.
Best pizza I have had in my life! The staff are all very warm and friendly and you can easily get a couple of slices and have that as your meal. Would definitely recommend. 10/10!
It was soooo delicious and the ladies were super nice! Not expensive at all. Definitely recommended!
The ladies were so attentive! My parents and I were due for a nibble, we decided to make a quick stop.Thepizzawas amazing ,
A small crowded place, which usually means it's good and authentic. Very good pizza, lots of different choices of toppings, enjoyed it very much!
Great pizza , one of the best once, lots of choices , vegetarian choice to , and good price to , strongly recommend
A fantastic place for the family to eat in Rome at a great price. Love the idea of being able to try lots of different pizzas paying by weight of slices.

We were in a hurry and needed a bite to eat between tours. I was glad our tour guide suggested this place because it was good pizza and you can order different flavors because you buy the pizza by the size. Friendly staff.

Best value for pizza and taste better than places charging more. Pops too are only 1.50, we were asked to pay double at some cafes. Good variety of pizza. And check out the cat sanctuary I'm the archeological site across the street.

column3: Amazing local pizza! Amazing lovely stuff!
column4: The place was lovely, pizza was insanely delocious! You can order different kind slices. And it really chip!

We strolled boyband jumped in to grab some pizza. The one with salad and scrimps was to die for! Nice and friendly staff. Read afterwards reviews on TripAdvisor in I agree. A good place for some fast Italian food ‚ù§

Don't let the name fool you. The pizza here is better than the state of Florida. Excellent pizza at an excellent price. But if you're looking for a place to sit and relax, this isn't it... just grab a quick slice. Yum!

column3: Really nice pizza and a great price
column4: Best pizza I had was Naples, but this was the second beer after a lot of pizza! Has a wide range of choice, tried 5 different ones and all good. Definitely worth a visit!
Very good pizza. Great variety of flavors. Fresh materials. Good prices. You must try it anyway. Perfect.

column3: Amazing place in every possible way!
column4: Pizza is fresh, cheap and most importantly ‚Äì amazing! If you are planning to visit Rome and find some good pizza, this is the place you should visit!
Delicious pizza , great variety, best value for money! The crust is flavourful and incredibly light. The variety of toppings means you can come again many times and always try something new!
Good place to take pizza away or enjoy on the premises. They have a nice variety of pizzas "al tagliio" and the prices are really honest.
Pizza Florida has variety of tasty pizzas with good price. It is also well connected with local bus services.
Best pizza we had in Rome. Frequented by local Romans and incredibly cheap! It's essentially a fast food place and perfect for a quick pit stop to refuel before taking in more of the sights.
Best pizzavalue for money ever. Great tasting pizza with various ingrediens which is weighed for the exact price. Friendly staff as well.
First day in Rome and first pizza there!it was super close to our hotel and we will visit this place alot during this stay!pizza will never be the same!
You can try different types of pizza and it is very cheap. 100 gr. is around 1,5 euro. We especially liked the pizza with tuna. Other ones were normal.

column3: Best Pizza slices on the Torre Argentina!
column4: Nice small place to eat your delicious pizza slices or take to go! Helpful staff and delicious slices!
The Pizza dough was like ciabatta - crispy outside and very fluffy inside. Best Pizza i ate until now - Thank you so much for that food expirience! awesome service - very nice!
This is a good place to get a quick snack. It is more of a take out place with many varieties of pizza. I loved the crust.
Ottima pizza!! Many local people, at midday is full! You need to try this pizza!!!!! Best time for visit,is 11/12, 14/16!!!
Only a few tables available but lots of variety of pizzas, sold by weight. Pizza for 2 and drinks for 12‚Ç¨. Best pizza we had un Rome so far
The pizza was awesome. During our stay we ate there 5 times. We try all of the kinds of pizza. It was really good.

column3: Good pizza √Æn the heart of Rome
column4: Nice place to eat somethin good and cheap. Like 10‚Ç¨ for two People and we had enough. And the advantage is that the plece √Æs nearby the main atractions. Nice place.
We ordered four different ones. The only one good was buffalo mozarella. Others were just so so, and one with fries kids did not finish eating. There are better options for lunch nearby.
It‚Äôs so crunchy yummy and full if flavors, try the Mozzrella de Bufala, so worth trying it, you will not regret it!!

We got a recommendation for this pizzeria, and since we were very closed we decided to try it. Every slice, even with the strangest topping, was just perfect! üëåüèª Better than any other (very good) pizza we had in Rome. Highly recommended.
the food was delicious and the personnel extremely friendly! We can only recommend it! The best take away pizza in Rome for an amazing price! Lots of love from SwitzerlandüòÑ
Pizza was really good, cheap and the service was great. Perfect for a quick lunch and pizza in Roma !
Very good pizza at a reasonable price. Nice staff. Very busy when we were there. Numerous varieties to choose from, and nice, thick crusts.
We ordered four different ones. The only one good was buffalo mozarella. Others were just so so, and one with fries kids did not finish eating. There are better options for lunch nearby.
It‚Äôs so crunchy yummy and full if flavors, try the Mozzrella de Bufala, so worth trying it, you will not regret it!!

We got a recommendation for this pizzeria, and since we were very closed we decided to try it. Every slice, even with the strangest topping, was just perfect! üëåüèª Better than any other (very good) pizza we had in Rome. Highly recommended.
the food was delicious and the personnel extremely friendly! We can only recommend it! The best take away pizza in Rome for an amazing price! Lots of love from SwitzerlandüòÑ

We were heading back to our room after a long morning of walking in the Trastevere area of Rome. We came across Pizza Florida and decided to stop in and get a slice. The server asked if the size of the sausage ‚Äì peppers slice...More
Pizza was really good, cheap and the service was great. Perfect for a quick lunch and pizza in Roma !

It was a great experience in this place. I have never tasted pizza like this. The crust is very crisp, staff suggested us some flavor and it was excellent. The most important thing is price is affordable. It depends on how weight you want to eat. For example, tuna pizza is 1.5 EUR / 100g. Staff can cut the size you want to eat, it mean you can eat three or more flavor for a meal. For me, I order 3 favors for 5.2 EUR and very full. It‚Äôs a good place every should visit when you come to Rome.
Very good pizza at a reasonable price. Nice staff. Very busy when we were there. Numerous varieties to choose from, and nice, thick crusts.

For 8 euro we had a ton of pizza and a beer (big). The dough super good and the flavors even better. My favorite was the cream of mushrooms one. we wanted to try the bacon and provolone one but they just ran out of it. Hope you can try it!

column3: Great value for money and quick service
column4: We decided to visit this place as it was recommended. As a European I found their pizza's average, it had a nice crunchy base and light dough. The general toppings were good. The tuna was the best one for me. You get to decide what size you want for your pizza as they cut it for you and for my 6 slices it came to ‚Ç¨5. Staff could be more friendly.
Many choises of pizza by gram. Any taste you can imagine. Good prices, small place, with few chairs, but very good and friendly service.
Vast choice of pizzas to choose from. There is not much seating inside but you can enjoy the pizza on the other side of the road watching the ruins at Largo Argentina.

Decent takeaway. The service was rude and sighed. but food was decent and mediocre. Bread With a crunch and a good palette. Ingridients compliment well but to safe. Very good takeaway. Not a restaurant quality. But really good instead of a dr oetker

Delicious pizza where they cut you off as much as you‚Äôd like so you can try as many as you‚Äôd like! Fast service and delicious. Also super inexpensive! Family of 4 (3 Adults & 1 Child) less than 10‚Ç¨!
We grabbed some pizza on our way back from a day of touring after this spot was recommended buy our Airbnb host and oh my goodness.. so delicious! Flavorful, delicious crust, and cheap!
Amazing pizza, even better service. Had an amazing variety of pizza, anything you can dream of üíïüíïüíïüíïüíïüíïüíï

column3: Very good pizza, very good price
column4: It was very nice place, good price for pizza in this localization, various kind of pizza to choose, very nice stuff. I really recommend.
I come especially here every time I‚Äôm in Rome! They have the must unique pizza and totally affordable üçï
I had takeout at this location 3 times while in Rome. Quite simple excellent pizza. The dough is amazing. I would recommend as it‚Äôs pretty cheap for a quick snack or lunch.
Service was excellent and the pizza was delicious! Can‚Äôt believe we left this until our last day, will be back.

column3: Best pizza we‚Äôve had in Italy so far
column4: This is one of those hidden jams you would never find unless you looked up reviews. The pizza was absolutely delicious and as inexpensive as you can ask for. One person can easily get full on only three euros
Pizza - Delicious! Local cuisine, place not only for tourists. Only cash At 10pm closed To sum up, you should visit this local diamond

One of the best pizza by the slice I have had so far in Rome. Definitely in the top 5. Fresh, inexpensive and a variety of choices. Plus you cant beat the view while enjoying your slice on their outdoor benches.

column3: Great for a quick and inexpensive bite
column4: Very friendly staff, excellent pizza. My favorite was the mushroom. It's in the Largo Argentina square, very close to the Pantheon and Campo di Fiore.
Had to wait quite a bit but it was all worth it. Nice fatty Margherita and really spicy and good tomato pizza

We had to visit this place based off TA reviews. Fresh pizza, pay by weight. Large bottle peroni beer only 2,00 Euro. People are friendly. Lots of pizzas to choose from. We tried 4 different slices and loved them all.
Came here after reading all the TripAdvisor reviews. Great choice of pizza, sold by gram. I‚Äôm allergic to dairy and still found 3 types I was able to eat. Would definitely come back.
Well worth the walk for some great pizza. Lots of choice of pizza, all sold by weight. A decent slice cost us ‚Ç¨2 and the same for a beer. Best pizza we had in Rome.

Probably the best Pizza !!! I found that place on TropAdvisor, very small shop, various tastes, very colorful, very tasty and not so expensive !! I realy enjoyed the persons working there, a must see in Roma
Best pizza in town. Very cheap too. Literally spent 4 euros and tried 3 different types of pizza. Plus the owners/employees were very nice! Must try spot in Rome!
Great choice if you want a fast snack on the go. To my suprise the onion pizza was very tasty. .....
Could have eaten here all week, basically did for snack pizza was so good. Had the mushroom and ham and cheese and cheese and tomato. Tomato was so fresh
Loved the pizza here. Great service, lots of interesting toppings as well as classics and well priced.

column3: The pick of all pizza places for us
column4: This has to be by far the best pizzas we ever had. The crust, the sauce, the toppings and the choices. It'll definitely spoil you for choices. We tried the buffala, the ones with aubergines, with ham. Oh All of them were really great!

column3: Best pizza we had in Rome.
column4: We tried to try as many different restaurants as we could during our short stay in Rome and this place was by far the best pizza we‚Äôve had. We would highly recommend for anyone visiting Rome. Also very reasonable and friendly staff.
Best pizza in Rome full stop. Buy by the weight of your slice of pizza. Many delicious choices, actually too many choices. Each pizza looks more tasty than the next. Very reasonable priced.

This is a great place, with super delicious Foccacia style piazza. Limited seating, buy many kinds of pizza and great prices. Right behind tha cat sanctuary at Largo Di Torre Argentina. Loved it and will return.

column3: The best pizza i have ever eaten
column4: They have won global awards for their delicious pizzas! Simply amazing, they would need tables and therefore bigger pizzeria, but still its a unique place and definitely going the next time I travel to Rome! You dont wanna miss this little pizzeria!
One of the best and cheap pizza shop of Rome. A lot of tastes of pizza and coldd Peroni beer (660cl for 2 euro).
Very good take away pizza. Enjoyed the zucchini, salmon, and buffalo mozzarella pizzas very much. Wish we could go back!

Very friendly service. Hasnt got enough space to sit inside. The amount is pretty good. The prices compared to the rest restaurant s of Rome are pretty descent. And the quality you get is satisfying. Would recommend for take away.
Amazing wide array of choices for pizza, all freshly made n bursting with flavour. Massimo was very friendly and welcominf and have great advice. We shall definitely be back next time we visit Rome
This pizza is amazing! We kept the receipt as a souvenir and went back a few years later just so good!!!
Grab a slice of fresh tasty pizza. It‚Äôs no frills and fills a gap. I‚Äôve not seen a Pizza Hut or a Dominoes in Rome, and places like this are probably the reason why.

We ordered pizza here for lunch on our visit to Rome. The pizza was excellent. Very fresh with a thicker, crunchy crust compared to the typical ROMA pizza. Great, friendly service and the prices were very reasonable
It's a stand and for cheap price you can get a decent nice pizza. Many variations and the sizes are up to how hungry you are. Recommend here for a quick to go good pizza.
Best pizza if Rome. They can cut as big slice as you want, and incredibly nice guy serve you out . Recommend it.
The pizza was ok, nothing special. I am not sure why this places is rated so highly. Really nothing to write home about.
I recommend to eat in this place.. Very good pizza, cheap and delicious üòã Good location and nice service
I had a quick lunch since this place was close to my B&B...very good pizza! The are options also for vegetarians

Can‚Äôt add much more to previous reviews: great, tasty, fresh pizza served by delightful staff at incredibly low prices. Meal for two at under ‚Ç¨10 including a large (660ml) Moretti..! Can‚Äôt beat it :-)
Very good pizza, friendly service (in many languages). Many different choices, also for vegetarians! Pizza paid by weight. Very affordable.
Best pizza I've ever tried in Rome!!! Great products, taste, price and customer service! The one with the tuna is incredible!

This is a no fuss perfect pizza. There are dozens of flavours on display. Pizzas are sold by slice and charged according to their weight. You can try as many as you like and it would not break the bank.

During our week in Rome we went multiple times to this small stop, not our habit as we like to discover new places.. but the pizza is just too good to miss, and for the price it is a great deal. Don't miss it!
We looked forward to returning here. We went back three times in eight days. Trying different types of pizza was enjoyable.
The most delicious pizza. I've tried few pizzas. You should try it. Very nice and friendly people are working there.
I had low expectations but was pleasantly surprised. The range of toppings is great and the pizza base itself is divine. Would definitely go back. Plus, the cheap price really is a bonus.

Good pizza. Tiny spot. Be prepared to eat standing outside or get take out (take away). I had 5 different types of pizza and they were all drlicious. Wasnt salty. I wish i had the stomach space to eat more
Amazing and super affordable pizza. This place has a good offer of flavours, crunchy and thin crust.

column3: Very good pizza with fair prices :)
column4: Awesome small takeaway restaurant with a great variety of delicous pizza. Prices are mesured by 100gr and there are 3 tables so sit down and enjoy your pizza.
Delightful pizzas, quick friendly service. Great range for meat lovers or vegetarians. I had to stop myself eating more
The pizza they sell in pieces, many tastes, very good and digestible. Highly recommended to everyone.
The quality of the pizza was great and very authentic. Decent selection. The prices are average and go by weight.
TripAdvisor didn‚Äôt steer us wrong. Some of the best pizza we‚Äôve eaten. Two slices and two beers for 10 euros, can‚Äôt be beat!
Delicious ...delicious....delicious. I cant get enough of the pizza served here. A lot of variety with fresh ingredients, excellent staff and reasonable prices.

column3: Best pizza we had in Rome
column4: Best pizza we had during our stay in Rome! There are plenty of options to choose from, the ones we tried were absolutely delicious! Make sure to order their philadelphia and porcini mushrooms pizza- DIVINE!
Many people say 'best' to many things. I have to say that Florida pizza is one of the best pizzas you can get in Rome, an easy 5 star rating. Ps: I did a refill to the pizza box on the spot !
Super good pizza ! Glad to find it. Prices between 1 and 1, 85 euro/100g. The place is too small for the big crowd.

Just dropped in and I just loved it. Not the best pizza ive had but the owner, WHO was friendly, happy and very funny, made the experience alot better. If you just want a small and quick bite, try this place! He made my day!
Best pizza in Italy hands down, great service and some really awesome combinations/servings. Extremely cheap for what you get. ex. 2 beers and 3 slices of pizza was 4 Euro. amazing deal.
Absolutely loved up to all of the reviews on here. Great authentic pizza (down to the scissors) and super cheap. Staff was friendly, and talkative. Great experience with great food!
I recomneded this pizza, it very tasty. And the boss of this bistro/ristorante is very good man. He like czech peoples so czech came here =)
I'm a pizza lover and this pizza was really belong most I've ever tried. Fast food and no place to sit though.

the real italian food just for us on the street. lots of pizza types all fresh just out of the oven. nothing sophisticated, just pizza. plus: fresh pizza, lots of flavors, smiling people, quick service minus: no tables outside, no pos, small space inside.

Loved the pizza, so many varieties and buy by the weight. So cheap but does not disappoint on quality. Only a couple of seats in the shop but very pleasant to sit outside around the piazza. You will return!
Pizza and service was amazing! A large peroni beer $2.00, soft drinks and water 1.00- you won't regret eating at this great little pizza place.

Walking by and decided to come in. The variety of pizzas looked great. Tried 4 different pizzas. All were great! The family managing the place are super friendly and nice. Worth the detour to taste some great pizzas!
Not too bad but I think there is better places to eat better pizzas. the advantage is to be able to take a lot of differents small piece of pizza

Wonderful pizza, friendly service and very affordable (you pay per weight of pizza)...we loved this place and highly recommend it. $1.50 for a bottle of Peroni in a busy city centre eaterie. ...you could have knocked me down with a feather! Brilliant!
Very small but very delicious. They sell it by the weight. Fluffy but crisp crust. Delicious. Go there!
it is great place to take fast and not expensive pizza! a lot of different flavours (especially unusial is pizza with shrimp). Great value for money! We vere satisfied!
The pizza with tuna was great really loved it we struggled a little to find a good pizzeria in the pizza land untill we found this one ,was yummy cant wait to get back

The best in Rome! excellent pizza!! Very friendly people! Extraordinary prices!!! We were 3 eating with good appetite, we ate 3 different kinds of pizzas, plenty of it plus 3 bottles of water for only ‚Ç¨ 9.68!!! Highly recommended!
Loved the pizza here. Priceed by weight ao is quite cheap. For a family of 4 we spent about ‚Ç¨15. The service was fantastaic - definitely recommend this restraunt!

We enjoyed it soo much and it was so yummy that I can't even explain. And it's also surprisingly very cheap. Recommended to everyone travelling to Rome. Make sure to try the philadelphia; I'm still craving it!
Went here following trip adviser recommendations. Staff were friendly however pizza was served pretty cold so pretty disappointing
Dropped in for a quick takeaway pizza, no wonder they are ranked so highly. So tasty, great friendly staff and very cheap.... Loved it.... best takeaway pizza :-)
All the slices we tried were delicious and completely worth their low price (1‚Ç¨+ for 100g each). Almost all other customers that came by were locals which is always a good sign!

This was our first stop after checking into our VRBO apartment. It's a hole in the wall pizzeria, but man does it have great pizza! We had slices of mushroom, margarita and proscuitto pizza and all were fantastic!

How anyone can fail to award this place 5* I don't know. I suppose I can't really talk having only been once but the staff were so friendly, the prices excellent, and the pizza yummy. Nice area to sit inside, and a bench just outside.

Conveniently located in a busy central street in Rome, it's a very good place to get your pizza and enjoy at home! We chose many different flavors and they were all delicious, except for the mushroom one which was average. I would recommend it!
Great pizza! Affordable and quick. Highly recommended. The staff is friendly but there isn't much room to sit. Good for grabbing a slice and going.

Various pizza for you to choose. All pizza go by weights. The best pizza we had in Rome! Friendly and helpful staffs. Only downside is you have to wait for the seats. But it's definitely a must-go pizza place!
A humble place, off Argentina square that serves outstanding pizza made with love. A great variety of delicious toppings on great dough. I'm taking too much. Just go there and try it.
It's very busy but it's fantastic value and really tasty! You grab a ticket when you're ready to order. It's very nice!
Amazing pizza try the bacon with pumpkin cream ! It's simply Amazing ! Good price and enjoyed a big Peroni !
We have visited everyday on our trip, the pizza is so tasty and the staff are lovely. 100% recommend
The pizza is delicious and the staff is hilarious! We loved our little pizza lunch! Our favorite was the onion pizza!

Soo convenient and soo good, light and crisp just how I like it, I can eat these any time of the day and soo cheap as well. Too bad you can't find one near termini :( I could use a simple meal right now.
The pizza was the best I've had this week! The staff was exceptionally friendly and helpful. I will definitely eat here again.

column3: This is not pizza this is bread with tomato sauce!
column4: I visited the store after reading the amazing reviews and I ended up eating one of the worst pizzas ever. I don't care about the price, I mean, how much can they charge you for one kilo of bread?
High value restaurant. Family of 4 shared outstanding pizza. Would highly recommend. Buffalo mozzarella is best one
The pizza is very good and not expensive. 1,50 ‚Ç¨/100gramms! beverages are cheap: water 0,70‚Ç¨, coke 1,50‚Ç¨, beer 3‚Ç¨. but only 3 tables inside. most costumers do take away.
Really great pizza and awesome service offered at Pizza Florida. I realy sugest to give it if near by. The prices also are really good.
Most everything worthwhile has already been said about Pizza Florida: very fresh pizzas, numerous choices, and a friendly staff that speaks English.
First day in Rome and we had the best pizza we had!!great deal of variety and we tasted almost every of them... delicious!!! The owner so originally friendly and funny..
You can eat at this place the weirdest and yet one of the best pizza slices! The price is really good, like in between 1.20 - 2 euros per 100 grams.

column3: Good, but nothing to die for
column4: Average pizza, not bad but not amazing. It did look pretty fresh, and quite affordable! The staff was not the friendliest, and no toilet. On the plus side, they have wifi!
Simple, fresh and really tasty pizza slices. Great stop for a quick snack. Space for seating is limited, so be prepared to stand for a few minutes. Popular with locals and reasonably priced.

Wife and were looking for a quick snack but was humbly surprised how delicious the pizza was here. We had the vegetarian with fresh herbs and tomatoes, but for me the crust was light and crunchy and quite delicious. Will come back.
Staff is really friendly and helpful. The pizza is delicious and they cut your slice however large or small you want it. The only thing I was disappointed in was it was not hot enough.
Exceptionally great food, very friendly owners, felt like home! Not much space, but you can find a seat or you can take it to the nearest park.
not expensive and taste good. You have got many chooses to eat and the place is nice located to eat quickly something.
The pizza is fresh and tasty, excellent variety and good prices. It is sold by the gram, so you can " mix snd match". The staff is friendly and helpful. Good for a quick meal.

Pizza was good and this is exellent place for takeaway. We have just travel to Rome and we just wanted to have something small. Pizzas for four person, three bottle of water and one beer was all together 16 euroes.
Cheap and delicious. Take away where you buy and choose any flavour of pizza by the square. We fed the family with drinks for less than 10 euros.
The best pizza ever in a good area good price and the best quality! Congrats!! We will come back for sure, grazie mille!!!
Stopped here after wandering Rome, super pizza slices, tasty and with a well cooked bottom. Friendly staff and great value. A lovely surprise. Recommended
Good and cheap shop with good selection of pizzas. Strong 4 stars. And they cut the slice as big as you want!
Delicios pizza the staff is very friendly a large selection. You can get a little or a lot as it is done by weight. Excellent and inexpensive.
It was really a fine pizza with good price! Local people eat there as well. Classic street food, very delicious pasta!
Very cheap but excellent pizza..Really kind staff..Free water and wifi..You must visit it..Try the margarita

column3: Grate food in a street style bar=restaurant
column4: Many original selections of pizza. highly recommended! I specially liked the one with Philadelphia and salami :)

column3: Super tasty typical Rome street food!
column4: Super tasty! A great way to star a walking tour around the city! Good variety of pizzas and TASTY! Lovely sales lady!
Must try the Prosciutto!. A bit out of the way of where we planned to go but the detour was lovely and worth it for the pizza.
great quality pizza for less money, will return asap, way better pizza then in costly restaurants, friendly waitress, family run business
Amazing pizza and as a plus you have all kind of pizzas to choose from :). Also, very cheap. From 1.20 to 1.80 per 100 grams. A must when in Rome.
Pizza here is amazing for a fare price! We eat in 3 people and expend 15 euros totally! The waitress was lovely and very helpful!!

Best pizza i ever ate in my life.really now i can't eat any other pizza because i will always compare it to this one.amayzing crust with bubles.wonderful toppings.cheap prices.not too many seats but do your self a favor and pay this place a visit.

column3: Cheap & delicious - definitely one to try!!
column4: Enjoyed take out pizza - 4 slices for ‚Ç¨10. Incredibly cheap (price is dependent on weight) and very tasty. The staff were very helpful - A must go to pizzeria, can see why it scores so highly. Would definitely return.

column3: One of the best in Rome
column4: The pizza's taste is more than good and the prices are very resionable, I have been there 3 times while in Rome, also the stuff is very friendly and speak good English.

Pizza is sold by weight. Good value for money. Tastes great. Some seats and 3 tables available to rest our tired feet after lots of walking. Cosy. Went back another day but found it closed due to public holiday on 8 Dec.
The best pizza I ever had so far.. Now I won't be able to rate any other place for pizzas after having eaten here.
For lunch, this is the best pizza in Rome!! Good location.. and best price.. Friendly staff.. very small, only 2-3 tables..

column3: A fantastic hole in the wall
column4: We simply searched google for pizza after wandering around the wedding cake and stumbled across this place. Great food, great price, and quick service.
Very tasty pizza, lots to choose from! We tried three kinds of pizza and all of them were exceptional!!Also very friendly staff!
Great taste, great variety, fantastic service. Loved the mozzarella pizza. Decent prices. Will come again soon.
Very good and tasty pizza if you want something to eat fast. Don't expect something more than that...
We were really hungry and found this place. There was a lot of people so it was a good sign. The variety of the pizzas are amazing, the staff is nice and the food is wonderful.
Best Pizza in Rome. We tried several spots and found nothing this good. So fresh, so many favors and so cheap!
Really good !!! The potato and sausage and cherry tomato is amazing !! I also like the Margarita and they even have us a bottle of red wine!
We went today and it was delicious very small but worth the visit crispy tasty pizza that you pay by weight
Lots to choose from, no seating but overall just okay. We had much better pizza in Italy but this one was really cheap and quick.
The value was great and the pizza very tasty. Pretty close to the main attractions, but the inexpensive price and quality were fabulous.
Some of the best pizza I've ever had. The different varieties are so good. Loved the shrimp cocktail pizza! The owner was so friendly. Amazing, cheap pizza
Great pizza, super cheap, lunch for two including a drink of bottled water was less than 7 euros! 5/7 would pizza again!

column3: Always tasty pizza and pleasant atmosphere
column4: I have been visiting this place every summer for 10 years now and have never been dissapointed! The best pizza in town, great variety, clean, pleasant atmosphere and the staff always ready to help you choose and chat a bit :) I love the place!!

Light dough with a crispy base. Plenty of options, veg, fish, meat... Served by friendly staff that don't mind bad Italian. The place is small with a couple of tables inside and a bench out side. Well recommended.
Very nice and tasty grate service ! Looks grate, littel place to sit but nice, many kinds of pizzas to pick from
We ate here 3 times during our 3 night stay in Venice. The pizza was so good. This is just a small shop, there is no seating. You have to take the pizza to go, which helps to provide low cost.
Strongly recommended. üòÄ Very nice owner who likelly offer the best. It means fresh ingredience,... Simply - piece of heaven in your mouth.

We went here after reading tons of trip advisor reviews but we were totallyPizza disappointed. W had the margarita pizza and the potato pizza, both were toppings on a bread. It is a very economical place though.
Lots of tasty choices and plenty of veggie pizzas, if not, they are happy to make for you. Very cheap too!
Went here for lunch and the place was very busy. Only takes cash. Was $11 euro for lunch for two. Staff was very friendly.

We loved all the kinds of pizza we tried! It was such a great find. We found out though that they were about to close for summer break the next day which broke our hearts. Amazing pizza, not to be missed
Went last night. You go in take a ticket and wait to be served. Pizza is delicious and the staff speak English. Pizza is weighed and the cost is variable. Well worth going
Perfect spot for good yet cheap pizza. Friendly and fast service. Enjoy it outside overlooking the Teatro Argentina ruins :-)

I was visiting the city with my wife and we randomly ran into this place. They have very good tasting and quality pizza for good prices. We encountered friendly staff and a number of pizzas to choose from. If around it should definitely be tried.
It was so nice that we got back there again for more pizza! 10's of different tasts and fresh colorful pizza call you!
Yummiest pizza I've ever had in my life. I visit Rome 2 times a year and lived there for a year. The people that work there are as awesome as their pizza!
Yumm delicious!! You won't regret it, you have to try it. Perfectly thin and crisp amazing toppings you never thought want together. Just great
Crisp crust, any version you can think of, even zucchini flower! Small place but worth the standing to eat here. No worries, you'll eat it so fast you won't be standing long!
Just arrived to Italy and found this place at our bus stop. Great introduction to the good food to come! Great service, not much seating, wide selection.

column3: Fast, cheap, tasty and good location
column4: Try pizza with cherry tomato and ricotta. Friendly staff, fast service, very good location, walking distance to several monuments (even Colloseum). Not a sophisticated restaurant but a good point to stop, breath and take a few slices of pizza.
It's a very very clean restaurant,the pizza very delicious, and the staff is very very helpful and cheerful. Thaaaank you Pizza Florida üòç
This was the perfect lunch on our way from the Colosseum to the Vatican! All of the reviews are right - best pizza!
Is there is a perfect pizza this is as close as when gets. I recommend the four cheese and the spicy salami.
A great variety to choose from, friendly staff and very decent prices. I'd say take one of everything!

column3: Best Pizza we had in Italy
column4: Love this place! Great value delicious pizza! The dough is perfectly chewy and soft, the toppings are varied and all delicious. This was some of the best pizza we had in Italy.
We wanted a quick bite on the move and read good reviews. I can order a pizza at the size that suits u. Light and delicious and really reasonably priced. Would definitely return.

Quite simply the best pizza I've ever had. This little fast food gem has a great selection of amazing pizza served in squares. Cheap. Popular with the locals too - I now know why. I had to go back again before leaving Rome.
It was great simple nice and TASTIE!!! We shall Come Back for sure. The service was fantastic as well, the guy knows the sports teams in every country.
A big range of Big square pizzas, sold in any size you like, so you can have a variety of all you fancy! Try the one with zucchini flowers, and also olive and sundried tomatoes. just too yummy!

We tried this pizza after we read reviews on TA. It was soooo nice with quality ingredients (buffalo mozarella zucchini, smoked cheese). We payed 15 euros for many pieces of pizza and we tried so many favours. I definitely recommend this plac it was awesoooome!
Grab a ticket and choose your slice. Many toppings on offer and they slice off the size you want. Very reasonable prices displayed per 100g. And delicious!
delicious pizza in rome, small place, with local flavor, many choices and great value! you can eat in there or sit in the benches outside with ruins view!
visited there in July 2014 and just wanted to let everyone know that the pizza is fantastico! Lots of varieties and all are great. Ate there 2 of the 3 days we were in Rome.
Wonderful place for lunch. Tasty , no really very tasty. A large variety of pizzas. Great service. Cheap
We ate here on our first afternoon on a recent trip to Rome. It's only a small shop and it was very busy but we were seen to quickly and had some lovely pizza. Prices were also very reasonable.
Very tasty pizza, we tried 4 varieties and they were all great. The prices are very reasonable, great value.

This place sets the bar for pizza. The base is more like a ciabatta, crunch on the outside and soft in the centre. I think we tried every topping they had over the course of two visits. Would highly recommend.
Honestly the best pizza I've ever had! And so cheap ! We went there almost every day! The staff is great so friendly as well :)
What fantastic pizza! Great selection of tremendously tasty pizzas, all for a terrific price. Two of us ate really well, with drinks for 10 euro. Can't go wrong here.
This place serves some of the best pizza I've ever eaten! I tried several of their options, and liked all of them! Even the simplest Margherita tastes out of this world here!

Really tasty Pizza! Great fluffy dough and tasty sauces. Staff and owner were really nice too. Simple bistro like interior but the tasty pizza is really worth it. Best Pizza I have eaten in whole of rome.
There were many different kinds of pizzas..we tasted almost everything! One of the best pizzarias in Rome! And the staff is super friendly..loved them :)
There are a lot of pizza places in Roma. But there is no doubht that pizza florida is the no. 1 pizza. Do not forget to visit also the cat shelter in the ruins in front of this great pizza.
Good "street" food - pizza, which is cut to your measure. Exactly what you need when you are on sightseeing trip in Rome. Cheap, good quality and fast
I want to come back to Rome to have the possibility to visit Pizza Florida again....or you have to open at my town :)
Thank you for sweet service! Good price for delicious pizza! Very good location!!! Come back soon :) visitors don't forget to leave tips ;)

Very good value for money pizza, the staff were extremely kind and welcoming of my family. This was despite a constant flow of customers, most of which were Italian speaking, so it's certainly popular with those that know real Italian pizza better than me!
The Pizza is good but not the best I've had (Alice Pizza across the VIttrio Emannuelle st. is the best), But Pizza Florida is good as well and the service is very good and there.
I was in Rome for pleasure and happened to taste their pizza. I think this place should be in the city tour....don't leave the city without tasting it..the best pizza ever!!!

column3: Delicious lunch stop and incredibly nice staff!
column4: This is a great place to stop in for lunch and is conveniently right across the street from the Torre Argentina Cat Sanctuary. It was so good we even went back twice! Staff was very nice and food was delicious!
Great pizza to-go for anyone who is on the run or for tourists looking to continue their visit and not stop at restaurants.
After my 6'th visit in Rome, an after testing a lot of pizza takeaways, I can declare this is one is absolutely the best
Great tasty pizza for a good value! You can either choose to take it away or eat in on few chairs that they have inside.
great pizza and many flavors to select..also very cheap!! yoy have to visit this place!we will visit it again before we leave
The food is just perfect, cheap and with great quality. Im here right now and never stop getting more and more people, the food is always flying and new one getting prepared

column3: Good pizza, good prices, good service
column4: This is a nice place to enjoy pizza. Easy recipe, good food, and fast and good service. You dont need to expend lots of eur on tourist restaurants to enjoy a good pizza.

Wonderful pizza! Have to try the pumpkin ( yes, pumpkin) pizza! Simply scrumptious as are other types as well. Crust is so good. The restaurant is not big or fancy ( only 3 tables), but the staff is very friendly and the pizza worth it.
Perfect taste & economical. Clean. Amazing attitude & welcoming staff. Recommend to go there for a snack or a meal .....

column3: extremely tasty and very good value.
column4: Found this place by chance after a long day at the Colosseum. The pizza here is just delicious, better than the restaurants we visited while in Rome. We sat outside on a bench with a couple of drinks. very reasonably priced.
As good as many Tripadvisers has wrote. Cheerful and polite personal selling tasty and fresh pizza. You can choose what you like and pay according to weight. We like !
This is a little take away pizza place that sells by the slice but also has some basic tables and stools. There are many different types of pizza to choose from.
Me any my family went here on our last few days of being in Rome and honestly it was my favorite pizza I had in Italy! Defiantly visit when in Italy
We found this place through the Trip Advisor reviews. The sausage and blue cheese pizza is delicious! It is inexpensive and the service is instant.
We hit up this place while on the way back to our hotel. It was quick, easy, and inexpensive -- but great! You can eat in, or you can grab it to go like we did.

Everything you need for pizza on the run. Briskly efficient yet friendly service has you out the door quickly. What takes the longest is choosing which pizza to have! So good, I went back the next day!
This is just what we were looking for. Run by a family for many years. The owner had a birthday today. Happy birthday gorgeous of man. We loved your pizza.

column3: Tasty meal that's easy on your wallet.
column4: Pizza sold by weight, and a wide range of flavours available. I picked pizza with salmon toppings, and tasted excellent.
Pizza tasted good, there are a lot of flavors. A few tables, but no chairs. Price and serving size are average.

We were on the go and the pizza was delicious and crunchy. The cherry tomatoes just exploded with freshness in your mouth. All the different combinations were great. The potato pizza was different but very good. Would highly recommend!
The pizza is one of the most tastiest pizzas in Rome. Centrale destination, cheap and so GOOD! The pizza is crispi and crunch, what make it better than the others.

Best Pizza in Rome. And right across from some OLD ruins. Worth a try. A take out joint with a variety of yummy square pizzas. Not much place to sit, and there is sometimes a long line, but it is worth it.

column3: Best pizza we had during our stay in Rome!
column4: The tomatoes were absolutely delicious :D Not too much space inside, but a perfect and affordable option for a take-away meal.
This is a takeaway although they have maybe 2/3 tables with chairs. Great pizza, lots of variety, nice staff.
Very good and tasty pizza. nice variety, cheap and simple. tried a few vegeterian options recommended.

This place is an amazing find! We were in Rome for 3 days and went everyday for a bite to eat on our way back from our day visiting the sites. Very friendly and fantastic value for money. The mozerella and basil is a must.

column3: Do Not miss it if you'r around
column4: We were roaming around Rome discovering the city and it was raining so we gave it a try.. Absolutely Amazing, we tried many flavors, all were delicious.. Specially the Tuna and the onions/tomatoes. Great staff too.
Pizza by the weight! Super friendly and delicious! Affordable drinks two! Also located by the planet of the cats which is probably the coolest place in the world!
This place is the nicest place! great pizza - good price, big variety, the localisation is great...the working staff....everything ....

column3: Maybe the best pizza al taglio in town
column4: The title says it: maybe the best pizza al taglio in Rome. Very nice taste, good bottom and kind service. Not expensive at all.
The taxi driver who drove us to Kame Hall told us it was the best pizza in not just Rome, but in the whole world. He was right about them making terrific pizza! We loved it!
This pizza tastes really good and it's super cheap. Great for a snack or pizza on the go. Loads of different varieties and all the drinks are cheap too under 1 euro.
Absolutely outstanding pizza by the slice. Friendly staff, either to eat there or to go. About 2-3 Euros per decent sized slice. Free wifi. Highly recommended when you are around in that area!!!

Very handy for us as we're staying about 2 doors down at the History Suite! Delicious slabs of pizza served by friendly and efficient staff. They put our pizza for 4 in a takeaway box which made life much easier.
No frills but great pizza. Highly recommend the zucchini pizza. Remember you pay by weight. Good place to stop on the way to the Victor Emmanuelle monument. Nice staff and no lines.
An unpretentious pizza restaurant offering a range of flavors and toppings. Servings are quite filling and you can choose the size of your slice and their prices can't be beat. Highly recommend it.

I felt in love with their pizza! :) You can choose from like 10 kinds of pizzas made of always fresh and premium quality ingredients. It's also very cheap by the way. Prices are almost the same as in termini "supermarket's pizzeria".

column3: one of the best pizzas in Rome
column4: Great crusty pizza, the best I have ever had! Very wide choices of pizza, fresh ingredients. Also very kind people working here. Thank you very much!

We found this place by chance as it is next door to our hotel. The pizza is delicious with a very good selection and good value for money. Even the water was reasonably prices compared to other spots in Rome.

Went here first night upon arriving in Rome - great pizza, great atmosphere, and very good value- my girlfriend and I had everything we wanted and it all came to under 15 Euro's including a drink each. Cheap, cheerful and tasty.
The best pizza we have ever eaten. I dont know whether it is the best in Rome - almost definitely not - but its the best we found. Its focaccia style.
This place has amazing pizza al taglio (by the slice) between the Capitoline and the Campo di Fiorri. There's minimal seating inside, but benches around the neighborhood if the weather is nice.
Excellent pizza, so much choice! Very friendly staff, don't let how busy it is put you off as service is quick.
A delicious pizza al taglio that makes you feel like a Roman - just buy it and go for a walk. A lot of different types, your only problem will be the choice!

After reading the reviews on here I made a point of hunting this place down and I wasnt disappointed, we both had a generous slice of fantastic pizza for 4 euros total! After having pizza in resteraunts this was by far the best!
This is one of the two best pizza we had while in Italy. There is always a freshly bake pizza coming out of the oven. we have tried 5-6 of them and they were all equally good. Highly recommended

Went based on TA recommendations. Cute idea of buying pizza by gram and testing many flavors, unfortunately all were about the quality of what you's get in an airport or shopping mall in terms of taste.

Just popped in after a long walk an O M G. Just looking in the case makes your mouth water. So many varieties. Had the mushroom,sausage and then the smoked salmon. Too full to try more but will be back for sure.
Best pizza, and best deal. The owner was the nicest guy. Wish we had found this place sooner we would have been back every day! They cut the pizza with scissors too, which was unique.

column3: perfect pizza in the perfect place
column4: perfect pizza in the perfect place, my trips to Rome would be the same without stops to pizzeria Florida

The pizza's are sold by weight, sliced with scissors and consumed standing or sitted on high stools. The dow is just right and the various toppings are superb. Service is quick with a smile. This is the perfect fueling station when exploring Rome on foot.

Superb little pizza shop. You get to choose exactly how big your pizza is and the price is excellent. Service was very friendly, they were extra helpful to non Italian speaking. Last but not least the pizza was awesome.
OMG, I recommend this to every single pizza lover. I have it twice a day, it's not just becuz it's cheap, it's becuz the pizza simply too good.

If you are anywhere nearby and even vaguely hungry, this is worth a trip. Definitely the best street food pizza we had in Rome, with lots of Italian customers. Staff helpful and friendly even to the tourists like us!

Run by the friendly Fiori family, fantastic Florida offers delicious slices of pizza with fresh toppings, such as fontina cheese, bacon and chilli. There is no shortage of creativity here. In a small shop they bring out sheet upon sheet of pizza. Some of the...More
